ie.ucd.clops.dsl.structs
Interface OptionDescription

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicOptionDescription, OptionGroupDescription
public interface OptionDescription

Represents information about an Option as entered in the CLOPS DSL generated by the DSL parser.

Author:
Mikolas, Fintan class_chart OPTION_DESCRIPTION indexing in_cluster: "DOCUMENTATION" explanation "Informal textual description of the purpose, format, dependencies and behaviour of a command line option" query "What is the name of the option?", "What is the short description?", "What is the long explanation?" end refines "OptionDescription.spec"
